Name: St Croix Sunset
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare pink grapefruit zest for garnish.
Express pink grapefruit zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fruity and bitter sweet with flavours of apricot, orange and lemon.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Fraser Campbell, The Alchemist, Melbourne, Australia.
Nutrition: One serving of St Croix Sunset contains 271 calories
